\begin{verbatim}
%!shared b, retmat
%! disp("testing __analyzerows")
%! b = [1 0 0 1; 1 0 0 0; 1 2 0 1];
%! retmat = __analyzerows(b);
%!assert(retmat(1,1)==1);#%!assert(retmat(1,1)==1);
%!assert(retmat(2,1)==1);
%!assert(retmat(3,1)==0);
%! b = [1 0 0 2; 1 0 0 0; 1 1 1 1];
%! retmat = __analyzerows(b);
%!assert(retmat(1,2)==0);
%!assert(retmat(2,2)==0);
%!assert(retmat(3,2)==1);
%! b = [1 0 0 2; 1 0 0 0; 1 1 1 1];
%! retmat = __analyzerows(b);
%!assert(retmat(1,3)==2);
%!assert(retmat(2,3)==0);
%!assert(retmat(3,3)==0);
%! retmat = __analyzerows(b);
%!assert(retmat(1,4)==1);
%!assert(retmat(2,4)==0);
%!assert(retmat(3,4)==0);
\end{verbatim}
